mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT (D.ID) FROM DONATIONS D WHERE D.ID_EMPLOYEE_TEAM = E.ID_EMPLOYEE AND D.ID_CAMPAIGN = E.ID_CAMPAIGN) TOTALDONATIONS, (SELECT SUM (D.AMOUNT) FROM DONATIONS D WHERE D.ID_EMPLOYEE_TEAM = E.ID_EMPLOYEE AND D.ID_CAMPAIGN = E.ID_CAMPAIGN) TOTALAMOUNTDONATIONS, (SELECT COUNT (D.ID_TYPE_PAY) FROM DONATIONS D WHERE D.ID_EMPLOYEE_TEAM = E.ID_EMPLOYEE AND D.ID_CAMPAIGN = E.ID_CAMPAIGN AND D.ID_TYPE_PAY =1) CREDITTYPE, (SELECT SUM (DR.PRODUCTIVE_HOURS) FROM DAILY_RECORDS DR WHERE DR.ID_EMPLOYEE_TEAM = E.ID_EMPLOYEE AND DR.ID_CAMPAIGN = E.ID_CAMPAIGN) TOTALPRODUCTIVEHOURS, (SELECT SUM (DR.NON_PRODUCTIVE_HOURS) FROM DAILY_RECORDS DR WHERE DR.ID_EMPLOYEE_TEAM = E.ID_EMPLOYEE AND DR.ID_CAMPAIGN = E.ID_CAMPAIGN) TOTALNONPRODUCTIVEHOURS FROM TEAM_EMPLOYEES E JOIN CAMPAIGNS C ON C.ID = E.ID_CAMPAIGN WHERE 1 = 1 AND E.ID_EMPLOYEE = #{campaignRequest.idEmployee} AND C.ID = #{campaignRequest.idCampaign}
